channel.title: Krull on tlake.io
channel.description: Recent content in Krull on tlake.io

item.title: collecting blood for fun and profit
item.description: Horns grows a pair of wings, and Cassandra agrees to help the party in exchange for the bag of devouring. A tortle named Krull escorts the Menagerie from Arkhan’s tower to Arkhan himself. They negotiate a trade of the orb of dragonkind for a vial of Tiamat’s blood and Val backs down from dueling Arkhan. Uldrak’s empyrean form is restored, and on the way back to the Demon Zapper the party stops at a conveniently-relocated Wandering Emporium to shelter from an acid storm.

item.title: Krull
item.description: Description Appearance A male tortle. Image property of Wizards of the Coast LLC. Personality Biography Follower of Arkhan the Cruel and gatekeeper of Arkhan’s tower on Avernus in the Nine Hells of Baator.
